eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Inventories
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Manage inventory items with limited or unlimited item capacity.

eventsFunctions.description: Add an item in an inventory.
eventsFunctions.name: AddItem

eventsFunctions.description: Remove an item from an inventory.
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveItem

eventsFunctions.description: the number of an item in an inventory.
eventsFunctions.name: ItemCount

eventsFunctions.description: Check if at least one of the specified items is in the inventory.
eventsFunctions.name: HasItem

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum number of the specified item that can be added in the inventory. By default, the number allowed for each item is unlimited.
eventsFunctions.name: ItemCapacity

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a limited amount of an object is allowed by the inventory. Item capacity is unlimited by default.
eventsFunctions.name: IsLimitedItemCapacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow a limited count of _PARAM2_ in inventory _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Allow a limited amount of an object to be in an inventory. Item capacity is unlimited by default.
eventsFunctions.name: SetIsLimitedItemCapacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow a limited count of _PARAM2_ in inventory _PARAM1_: _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an item has reached its maximum number allowed in the inventory.
eventsFunctions.name: IsItemCapacityReached

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an item is equipped.
eventsFunctions.name: IsItemEquipped

eventsFunctions.description: Mark an item as being equipped. If the item count is 0, it won't be marked as equipped.
eventsFunctions.name: SetIsItemEquipped

eventsFunctions.description: Save all the items of the inventory in a scene variable, so that it can be restored later.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Save an inventory in a scene variable
eventsFunctions.name: CopyInventoryToVariable

eventsFunctions.description: Load the content of the inventory from a scene variable.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load an inventory from a scene variable
eventsFunctions.name: CopyToVariableToInventory

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ButtonStates
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use any object as a button and change appearance according to user interactions.
description: Use the "Button states" behavior to track user interactions with an object, including:
Add additional behaviors to make juicy buttons with animated responses to user input:

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctions.description: Reset the state of the button.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetState

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIdle

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button was just clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the cursor is hovered over the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsHovered

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is either hovered or pressed but not hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFocused

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed outside with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressedOutside

eventsFunctions.description: the touch id that is using the button or 0 if none.
eventsFunctions.name: TouchId

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Enable effects on buttons based on their state.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonObjectEffects

eventsFunctions.description: the idle state effect of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: IdleEffect

eventsFunctions.description: the focused state effect of the object. The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
eventsFunctions.name: FocusedEffect

eventsFunctions.description: the pressed state effect of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PressedEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: Focused state effect
propertyDescriptors.description: The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
propertyDescriptors.name: FocusedEffect

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Change the animation of buttons according to their state.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the idle state animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: IdleAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the focused state animation name of the object. The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
eventsFunctions.name: FocusedAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the pressed state animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PressedAnimationName

propertyDescriptors.label: Focused state animation name
propertyDescriptors.description: The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
propertyDescriptors.name: FocusedAnimationName

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly change an effect on buttons according to their state.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonObjectEffectTween

eventsFunctions.name: PlayTween
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the effect property of object _PARAM0_ over _PARAM2_ seconds with _PARAM3_ easing

eventsFunctions.description: the effect name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: EffectName

eventsFunctions.description: the effect parameter of the object. The effect parameter names can be found in the effects tab with the "Show parameter names" action of the drop down menu.
eventsFunctions.name: EffectProperty

eventsFunctions.description: Change the effect parameter of the object. The effect parameter names can be found in the effects tab with the "Show parameter names" action of the drop down menu.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEffectProperty
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the tweened effect of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ with parameter _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: the idle effect parameter value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: IdleValue

eventsFunctions.description: the focused effect parameter value of the object. The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
eventsFunctions.name: FocusedValue

eventsFunctions.description: the pressed effect parameter value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PressedValue

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in easing of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeInEasing

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-out easing of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeOutEasing

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeInDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-out duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeOutDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Effect parameter
propertyDescriptors.description: The effect parameter names can be found in the effects tab with the "Show parameter names" action of the drop down menu.
propertyDescriptors.name: EffectProperty

propertyDescriptors.label: Focused effect parameter value
propertyDescriptors.description: The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
propertyDescriptors.name: FocusedValue

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly resize buttons according to their state.

eventsFunctions.description: the idle state size scale of the object.

eventsFunctions.description: the pressed state size scale of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PressedScale

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeInDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-out duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeOutDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in easing of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeInEasing

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-out easing of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeOutEasing

propertyDescriptors.label: Focused state size scale
propertyDescriptors.description: The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.
propertyDescriptors.name: FocusedScale

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly change the color tint of buttons according to their state.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonColorTintTween

eventsFunctions.description: the focused state color tint of the object. The state is Focused when the button is hovered or held outside.

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FadeInDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-out duration of the object.

eventsFunctions.description: the fade-in easing of the object.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Sticker
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Make objects follow the position and rotation of the object they are stuck to.
description: This extension can be useful to:
- Delete an object with another one
An example allows to check it out ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://stick-objects)).

eventsFunctions.description: Define helper classes JavaScript code.
eventsFunctions.name: DefineHelperClasses

inlineCode: * Update the coordinates in the basisObject basis.
* It uses the basisObject coordinates from the previous frame.
* This way, the sticker can move relatively to it and still
// Save initial values to avoid calculus and rounding errors
* Copy the coordinates to use it the next frame.
* This method is also called by children to ensure
// If the behavior on the basis object has a different name,
// the objects will still follow their basis objects
// Follow parents 1st to avoid frame delays
// Unproportional dimensions changes won't work as expected
// if the object angle is not null but nothing more can be done
// because there is no full affine transformation on objects.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is stuck to another object.
eventsFunctions.name: IsStuck

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Stick the object to another. Use the action to stick the object, or unstick it later.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Sticker

inlineCode: // Set up the scene sticker objects list - if not done already.
// Register this object as a sticker.

eventsFunctions.description: Stick on another object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stick

inlineCode: // An object can stick to only one object.

eventsFunctions.description: Unstick from the object it was stuck to.
eventsFunctions.name: Unstick

propertyDescriptors.label: Destroy when the object it's stuck on is destroyed
propertyDescriptors.name: IsDestroyedWithParent

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteContinuousBar
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
There are ready-to-use resource bars in the asset-store [resource bars pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=resource-bars-resource-bars).

changelog.breaking: - Resource bars now use "variants", allowing easy swapping of their visual aspect. You will have to make some adjustments to existing resource bars in your project. Follow this [migration documentation](https://wiki.gdevelop.io/gdevelop5/objects/custom-objects-prefab-template/migrate-to-variants/) to do these changes.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ResourceBar

events.comment: This is done after the events to allow users to read the previous value at the end of the change.

eventsFunctions.description: the value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Value

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxValue

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is empty.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEmpty

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is full.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFull

eventsFunctions.description: the previous high value of the resource bar before the current change.

eventsFunctions.description: Force the previous resource value to update to the current one.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdatePreviousHighValue
eventsFunctions.sentence: Update the previous resource value of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: the previous high value conservation duration (in seconds) of the object.

eventsFunctions.sentence: the previous high value conservation duration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the resource value is changing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsChanging

propertyDescriptors.label: Previous high value conservation duration (in seconds)
propertyDescriptors.name: PreviousHighValueDuration

events.comment: Anchors won't work as there is an absolute margin and a proportional size at the same time
This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the label over the bar.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.
